markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Victory Plate](/Equipment.aspx?ID=752)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 264 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk** 4
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Armor** [Full Plate](/Armor.aspx?ID=13)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The metal plates of this _+1 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [full plate](/Armor.aspx?ID=13)_ are covered by a bright tabard featuring a distinctive coat of arms divided into four fields. This insignia magically records your recent victories, displaying one triumph in each field of the coat of arms, allowing you to call upon those victories for aid in future battles.

<document level="2" id="action-593" />

<document level="2" id="action-594" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 9"
pfs="Standard"
>
Victory Plate
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 264 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Price** 675 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** 4

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 15"
pfs="Standard"
>
Victory Plate (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 264 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Price** 5,500 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** 4

</row>

</column>

---

The armor is a _+2 greater resilient full plate_. You can use the second activation once per minute instead of once per hour, and the resistance it grants is 10, or 20 for the ooze's resistance against precision damage.
name: Victory Plate
